long_description: The ultralight Exped Schnozzel Pumpbag works like a bellows, delivering air into your Exped sleeping mattress. Pumpbag doubles as a waterproof roll-top stuff sack and a pack liner. Pumbag features an integrated Schnozzel valve at the bottom that connects to valve on air mattress; to use as pump, loft the sack, seal, roll and push air into mattress. Designed for use with Exped pads that do not have an integrated pump, such as the Exped SynMat UL 7. Taped seams hold the line against the elements.
short_description: The ultralight Exped Schnozzel Pumpbag works like a bellows, delivering air into your Exped sleeping mattress.
